save.success: Entity [{{name}}] in system was successfully saved

schemaObjectClasses.title: Scheme
schemaObjectClasses.generateSchemaBtnTooltip: Generates and saves system scheme. Scheme is obtained from connector used by current configuration. When generating scheme, if object or attribute with the same name is found, it will be replaced by the current value in system. Other objects and attributes will remain unchanged.

create.header: New type of object in system

save.success: Object type [{{name}}] in system was successfully saved

generateSchema.message:
Generate and save scheme in this system. Scheme will be obtained from connector based on current configuration.
If there will be object or attribute with the same name, it will be replaced (regenerated by state on end system). Other objects and attributes will remain unchanged.

Do you really want to start schema generating / recovery?
generateSchema.success: Generation of scheme for system '{{name}}' successful.

startSynchronization.message: Do you really want to start synchronization/reconciliation '{{name}}' manually?
startSynchronization.started: Synchronization/reconciliation '{{name}}' started as long running task, results will be shown on synchronization detail or in long running task agenda.

cancelSynchronization.message: Do you really want to stop synchronization/reconciliation '{{name}}'?

systemSynchronizationConfigDetail.title: Synchronization details
systemSynchronizationConfigDetail.situationActionsAndWf: In section below, it is possible to define how synchronization will react in given situations. Synchronization behavior is affected by selected workflow. Workflow is started after execution of standard action for each element. Workflow must ensure changes are saved.
systemSynchronizationConfigDetail.customFilterInfo: Custom filter can be defined by selection of attribute (Filter by attribute) by which we want to find relevant operations (Filtering operations). More complicated criteria can be defined in section below.
systemSynchronizationConfigDetail.treeInfo: Synchronization of Tree is always execute as reconciliation.

create.success: Configuration of  synchronization [{{name}}] was successfully created

save.success: Configuration of synchronization [{{name}}] was successfully saved

displayName.label: Name
displayName.placeholder: Finds logs containing value in name.

save.success: Account in system was successfully created

button.checkSystemTooltip: Saves current settings and requires test on connector.

save.success: Connector configuration for system [{{name}}] successfully saved.

changeConnector.message:
Immediate save of system with new connector.
Current connector will no longer be active and its configuration will be lost.

Do you really want to change connector and save system?

save.success: Object type [{{name}}] in system successfully saved

mappings.header: Attributes mapping<small> attribute groups for operation and entity type</small>
mappings.title: Mapping

edit.header: Mapping details of entities and operations

create.success: Mapping for entity type [{{name}}] successfully created
create.header: New mapping for entity and operation

save.success: Mapping for entity type [{{name}}] successfully saved

mappingDetail.title: Mapping of attributes
mappingDetail.header: Mapping of attributes <small>for IdM entity and operation type</small>

edit.header: Details of IdM entity type and operation

create.header: New type of IdM entity and operation
create.success: IdM entity type [{{entityType}}] for operation [{{operationType}}] successfully created

save.success: IdM entity type [{{entityType}}] for operation [{{operationType}}] successfully saved

protectionEnabled.help: Enables account protection before deletion. When trying to remove an IdM account (last relation assigning this account), it will be marked as 'Is protected'. Such an account will not be deleted or provisioned. To really delete the IdM account (and thus the account on the end system), it will occur after the expiration of the protection interval. Deleting performs a scheduled task.

attributeDetail.title: Attribute in schema
attributeDetail.returnedByDefaultTooltip: Attribute contained in result of account search. This is not applied, for example, to password attribute, which is not returned in result by default

attributeMappingDetail.title: Attribute in IdM
attributeMappingDetail.alertNoRepository: Attribute is not mapped to any entity in CzechIdM or extended attribute. Output will be a constant from 'Transformation to system'
attributeMappingDetail.infoPasswordMapping: If attribute __PASSWORD__ is equal to value NULL, it will be automatically generated from password policy for system.

retry.message: Retry only selected operation {{name}}. Only selected operation will be executed regardless of other records in queue. Sequence of operations may not be followed.
retry.message_plural: Retry only {{count}} selected operations. Only selected operation will be executed regardless of other records in queue. Sequence of operations may not be followed.
retry.batchMessage: Retry all operations for selected entity {{name}} in queue. All operations for selected entity will be sent to system. Sequence sorted as per time of entering queue. Final state of entity in system will be retained
retry.batchMessage_plural: Retry all operations for selected entity by {{count}} selected operations in queue. All operations for selected entities will be sent to system. Sequence sorted as per time of entering queue. Final state of entities in system will be retained
retry.success: Retrying of provisioning operations has been started.

cancel.message: Or do you want to cancel just selected operation {{name}}?
cancel.message_plural: Or do you want to cancel just {{count}} selected operations?
cancel.batchMessage: Do you want to cancel all operations for entity {{name}} in queue?
cancel.batchMessage_plural: Do you want to cancel all operations for entity {{count}} in queue?

readonly.label: Read-only
readonly.help: Active provisioning operations create, update and delete, will not be executed.

queue.label: Supports queue
queue.help: Active provisioning operations create, update and delete, will run through the queue.

remoteConnector.label: Use remote connector server
remoteConnector.help: After check, local connectors will not be used.

idmPropertyName.label: IdM key
idmPropertyName.help: Name of entity attr., name of extended attr., or key to confidential storage.

transformToResourceScriptSelectBox.label: Available scripts for transformation from resource
transformToResourceScriptSelectBox.help: After script selection, will be automatically insert code which calls selected script including sample parameters.

transformFromResourceScriptSelectBox.label: Available scripts to transformation to resource
transformFromResourceScriptSelectBox.help: After script selection, will be automatically insert code which calls selected script including sample parameters.

transformFromResourceScript.label: Transformation from system
transformFromResourceScript.help: Allows value to be transformed from system into a form suitable for CzechIdM. Input parameters of this Groovy script are value of the attribute 'attributeValue' and list 'icAttributes' of object attributes in system.

authenticationAttribute.label: Authentication attr.
authenticationAttribute.help: Attribute used for authentication on connected system.

transformToResourceScript.label: Transformation to system
transformToResourceScript.help: Allows value to be transformed from CzechIdM into a form suitable for connected system. Input parameters of this Groovy script are value of attribute 'attributeValue', IdM entity 'entity' and account identifier 'uid'. If output value is empty, system automatically uses available account identifier (uid).

uid.label: Identifier
uid.tooltip: Attribute is unique identifier of object.

sendOnlyIfNotNull.label: Send IdM value only if its not null
sendOnlyIfNotNull.tooltip: Value for this attribute (computed by CzechIdM), will be sent on target system only if value is not null.

sendAlways.label: Send always
sendAlways.tooltip: Value for this attribute will be always send on target system. Even if is not changed.

disabledAttribute.label: Disabled
disabledAttribute.tooltip: Disabled attribute will not be used in provisioning in default state. It can still be overload and activated in roles.

name.label: Name
name.help: User-defined name of this system attribute, overloaded by the role.

RoleSystemAttribute.disabledDefaultAttributeTooltip: If checked, attribute will never be send to system. Even if the attribute has default mapping.

transformScript.label: Transformation to system
transformScript.help: Allows to transform value from CzechIdM to state intended for connected system. Input parameters of this Groovy script are attribute value 'attributeValue', IdM entity 'entity' and account identifier 'uid'. If script output value is null, than returning value is available account identifier (uid).

customFilter.label: Use custom filter
customFilter.help: Synchronization will be managed by custom filter defined below. When not selected, synchronization is managed by connector mechanisms. The filter is NOT used during reconciliation.

filterAttribute.label: Filter by attribute
filterAttribute.help: This attribute (with type of filter operation) will be used as default filter criteria for synchronization. Other criteria can be defined in filter script.

customFilterScript.label: Custom filter
customFilterScript.help: This Groovy script sets own search filter for accounts in system to be synchronized.

rootsFilterScript.label: Definition of tree roots
rootsFilterScript.help: This Groovy script sets definition of tree root. Script input is 'account' (IcObject). Output must be Boolean ('true' for root). Without script implementation, every element without parent is consider as root.

reconciliation.label: Reconciliation
reconciliation.help: Executes full reconciliation instead of synchronization. Synchronization will be executed for all accounts without filter. Search for missing accounts will be executed for all entities in CzechIdM.

AttributeMappingStrategyTypeEnum.CREATE: Write only on create of the entity
AttributeMappingStrategyTypeEnum.WRITE_IF_NULL: Write only if target value is null

CONNECTOR_CONFIGURATION_FOR_SYSTEM_NOT_F.title: Connector was not selected
CONNECTOR_CONFIGURATION_FOR_SYSTEM_NOT_F.message: Connector for system [{{system}}] is not defined. Please, select connector definition in system settings.

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_MORE_UID.title: Unique identifier already exists
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_MORE_UID.message: System [{{system}}] has already set unique identifier.

PROVISIONING_ROLE_ATTRIBUTE_MORE_UID.title: Unique identifier already exists
PROVISIONING_ROLE_ATTRIBUTE_MORE_UID.message: Role [{{role}}] and system [{{system}}] have already set unique identifier.

PROVISIONING_SYSTEM_DISABLED.title: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] wasn't executed
PROVISIONING_SYSTEM_DISABLED.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] in system [{{system}}] wasn't executed. System is configured as inactive.

PROVISIONING_SYSTEM_READONLY.title: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] not executed
PROVISIONING_SYSTEM_READONLY.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] in system [{{system}}] wasn't executed. System is in read-only mode.

PROVISIONING_PREPARE_ACCOUNT_ATTRIBUTES_.title: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] wasn't executed
PROVISIONING_PREPARE_ACCOUNT_ATTRIBUTES_.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] in system [{{system}}] failed.

PROVISIONING_FAILED.title: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] wasn't executed
PROVISIONING_FAILED.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] in system [{{system}}] failed.

PROVISIONING_SUCCEED.title: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] executed
PROVISIONING_SUCCEED.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] in system [{{system}}] successfully finished.

PROVISIONING_IS_IN_QUEUE.title: Provisioning task for account [{{name}}] stored to queue
PROVISIONING_IS_IN_QUEUE.message: Account has some unfinished provisioning tasks in queue. New provisioning task for account [{{name}}] in system [{{system}}] was stored to queue.

PROVISIONING_IDM_FIELD_NOT_FOUND.title: Item for provisioning not found
PROVISIONING_IDM_FIELD_NOT_FOUND.message: IdM item [{{field}}] for entity [{{entity}}] was not found!

PROVISIONING_PASSWORD_FIELD_NOT_FOUND.title: System [{{system}}] not support change password
PROVISIONING_PASSWORD_FIELD_NOT_FOUND.message: Mapping attribute for password (___PASSWORD__) for entity [{{entity}}] was not found!

PROVISIONING_SCHEMA_ATTRIBUTE_IS_NOT_UPD.title: Provisioning - attribute is not able for update
PROVISIONING_SCHEMA_ATTRIBUTE_IS_NOT_UPD.message: Attribute [{{attribute}}] for entity [{{entity}}] is not 'able for update'!

PROVISIONING_RESOURCE_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUN.title: Provisioning - attribute was not found on connected system
PROVISIONING_RESOURCE_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUN.message: Attribute [{{attribute}}] for entity [{{entity}}] was not found on connected system!

PROVISIONING_PASSWORD_WRONG_TYPE.title: Provisioning - password must be GuardedString
PROVISIONING_PASSWORD_WRONG_TYPE.message: Password attribute must be type of GuardedString!

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_WRONG_TYPE.title: Provisioning - attribute value is not in correct type
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_WRONG_TYPE.message: Schema of attribute [{{attribute}}] defines type of [{{schemaAttributeType}}]. But value type is [{{valueType}}]!

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_NOT_FOUND.title: Provisioning - attribute value was not found
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_NOT_FOUND.message: Attribute schema [{{attribute}}] defines type [{{schemaAttributeType}}]. This type cannot be retrieved!

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_UID_IS_NOT_STRING.title: Provisioning - UID value is not String
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_UID_IS_NOT_STRING.message: Value of UID attribute must be type of String, but given type is [{{uid}}]!

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_UID_NOT_FOUND.title: Provisioning - UID attribute was not found
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_UID_NOT_FOUND.message: UID attribute was not found in system [{{system}}]. UID attribute is necessary for provisioning (or sync)!

PROVISIONING_DUPLICATE_ROLE_MAPPING.title: Provisioning - More attribute definitions for the same role
PROVISIONING_DUPLICATE_ROLE_MAPPING.message: There was found more definitions of attributes for same role [{{role}}], in system [{{system}}] and entity type [{{entityType}}]!

PROVISIONING_DIFFERENT_UIDS_FROM_CONNECT.title: Provisioning - UID attribute not found
PROVISIONING_DIFFERENT_UIDS_FROM_CONNECT.message: Connector returned more different UIDs, for different object classes!

PROVISIONING_MERGE_ATTRIBUTE_IS_NOT_MULT.title: Provisioning - MERGE is not multivalued
PROVISIONING_MERGE_ATTRIBUTE_IS_NOT_MULT.message: Object [{{object}}]. For MERGE strategy must be attribute [{{attribute}}] multivalued!

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_STRATEGY_CONFLICT.title: Provisioning - Attribute strategy conflict
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_STRATEGY_CONFLICT.message: Strategies [{{strategyParent}}] and [{{strategyConflict}}] are in conflict for attribute [{{attribute}}]!

SYNCHRONIZATION_SYSTEM_IS_NOT_ENABLED.title: System is disabled
SYNCHRONIZATION_SYSTEM_IS_NOT_ENABLED.message: Synchronization [{{name}}] cannot be started, because system [{{system}}] is disabled!

CONFIDENTIAL_VALUE_IS_NOT_GUARDED_STRING.title: Confidential attribute is not GuardedString
CONFIDENTIAL_VALUE_IS_NOT_GUARDED_STRING.message: Confidential attribute [{{property}}] is not type of GuardedString, but it's [{{class}}]!

SYNCHRONIZATION_CORRELATION_TO_MANY_RESU.title: Synchronization - too many entities was found for correlation attribute
SYNCHRONIZATION_CORRELATION_TO_MANY_RESU.message: Too many entities was found for correlation attribute [{{correlationAttribute}}] for value [{{value}}]!

SYNCHRONIZATION_TOKEN_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUN.title: Synchronization - for synchronization by custom attribute is compulsory attribute Token!
SYNCHRONIZATION_TOKEN_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUN.message: for synchronization by custom attribute is compulsory attribute Token!

SYNCHRONIZATION_TO_MANY_SYSTEM_ENTITY.title: Synchronization - more than one record of 'System entity' was found
SYNCHRONIZATION_TO_MANY_SYSTEM_ENTITY.message: More than one record of 'System entity was found for UID [{{uid}}]!

SYNCHRONIZATION_FILTER_VALUE_WRONG_TYPE.title: Synchronization - filter for synchronization must be type of 'IcFilter'
SYNCHRONIZATION_FILTER_VALUE_WRONG_TYPE.message: Filter for synchronization must be type of 'IcFilter', but the value type is [{{type}}]!

SYNCHRONIZATION_ERROR_DURING_SYNC_ITEM.title: Synchronization - error during synchronization
SYNCHRONIZATION_ERROR_DURING_SYNC_ITEM.message: During synchronization of UID [{{uid}}], unexpected error has occurred!

SYNCHRONIZATION_TO_MANY_ACC_ACCOUNT.title: Synchronization - more than one records of 'AccAccount' found
SYNCHRONIZATION_TO_MANY_ACC_ACCOUNT.message: Found more that one records of 'AccAccount' for the same UID [{{uid}}]!

SYSTEM_MAPPING_DELETE_FAILED_USED_IN_SYN.title: System mapping [{{mapping}}] cannot be removed
SYSTEM_MAPPING_DELETE_FAILED_USED_IN_SYN.message: System mapping [{{mapping}}] cannot be removed. It's used for synchronization of the same system!

ATTRIBUTE_MAPPING_DELETE_FAILED_USED_IN_.title: Attribute [{{attribute}}] cannot be removed
ATTRIBUTE_MAPPING_DELETE_FAILED_USED_IN_.message: Attribute [{{attribute}}] cannot be removed. It's used for synchronization of the same system!

SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_ENTITIES.title: System cannot be removed
SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_ENTITIES.message: System [{{system}}] cannot be removed. There are managed entities in system.

SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_ACCOUNTS.title: System cannot be removed
SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_ACCOUNTS.message: System [{{system}}] cannot be removed. There are managed accounts in system.

SYSTEM_ENTITY_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_OPERATIO.title: Entity in system cannot be removed
SYSTEM_ENTITY_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_OPERATIO.message: Entity [{{uid}}] in system [{{system}}] cannot be removed. Active provisioning operations exist for the entity.

REMOTE_SERVER_INVALID_CREDENTIAL.title: Bad password for remote connector server
REMOTE_SERVER_INVALID_CREDENTIAL.message: Bad password for remote connector server [{{server}}]

REMOTE_SERVER_CANT_CONNECT.title: Can't connect to remote connector server
REMOTE_SERVER_CANT_CONNECT.message: Can't connect to remote connector server [{{server}}]

REMOTE_SERVER_UNEXPECTED_ERROR.title: Unexpected error
REMOTE_SERVER_UNEXPECTED_ERROR.message: Unexpected error while connect to server [{{server}}]

CONNECTOR_FORM_DEFINITION_NOT_FOUND.title: Form definition for connector not found
CONNECTOR_FORM_DEFINITION_NOT_FOUND.message: Form definition for system not found, please choose connector first.

ACCOUNT_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_IS_PROTECTED.title: Account [{{uid}}] cannot be deleted!
ACCOUNT_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_IS_PROTECTED.message: Account [{{uid}}] cannot be deleted! Is protected!

SYSTEM_MAPPING_TREE_TYPE_DELETE_FAILED.title: Tree type cannot be deleted
SYSTEM_MAPPING_TREE_TYPE_DELETE_FAILED.message: Tree type [{{treeType}}] is already use in mapping for system [{{system}}]. Remove mapping from the system before deleting.

ROLE_SYSTEM_ALREADY_EXISTS.title: Duplicate mapping
ROLE_SYSTEM_ALREADY_EXISTS.message: Mapping for same role [{{role}}] and same system [{{system}}] already exists!
